Reviews.Title: It is just and extion
Reviews.Author: jon
Reviews.Content: It is what is a ext ion for my PTZ Swann camera which even fought as tight as I could need more wire. No swann retailers I know of carried this cable . So it works as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: David G.
Reviews.Content: This 50 ft. cable kit worked out just fine. At first I had a camera that the power cable would not fit with this cable.  So I was very disappointed. I was ready to send back to Amazon for a refund. Solution was solved by buying a $2.00 adapter. So I decided to go ahead and keep it. Glad I did, but later found that the problem was not this cable, the problem was the PTZ camera I had purchased. Which eventually returned back to the seller (on Ebay). Bought another PTZ camera and works great with this set of cables. I later bought another cable kit (100 ft.) for another PTZ camera.To sum it up, these cables are very well made, adapts to all weather, great quality at a great price. I would highly recommend these cables to any and everyone.

Reviews.Title: Good Cable but marked wrong
Reviews.Author: Paul Stevenson
Reviews.Content: Well made cable.  Only problem was that the RS485 connector was labeled wrong (= and - markings).  It took some time to figure it out.  Changing the molded end and marking it with red and black markings was easier than changing the red and black wire tips.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy to connect co-ax extension with 3-in-1 OSD control, video power
RS845 connection for cameras with OSD (On Screen Display) /PTZ capability
75 ohm, double shielded & weather resistant to withstand harsh conditions
Send power to your camera via this cable
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWPRO-15MCAB-GL 3-In-1 Multi-Purpose 50-Feet BNC Cable (White)
